pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Anything goes. Stephen Sondheim tribute broadcast, 1980
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Radio interview with American composer and lyricist Stephen Sondheim. Excerpts from his music and songs composed for various films, such as I never do anything twice (from film Seven percent solution), and musicals, such as The frogs, Pacific overtures, Sweeney Todd, Merrily we roll along, are played during the interview.
